mapper.sql: qiio.ipqc_inspection_order_id, qiio.ipqc_inspection_order_code, qiio.work_order_id, qiio.material_id, qiio.supplier_id, qiio.qty, qiio.inspection_way_id, qiio.inspection_standard_id, qiio.inspection_status, qiio.inspection_result, qiio.audit_status, qiio.audit_dept_id, qiio.audit_user_id, qiio.`status`, qiio.attachment_path, qiio.remark, qiio.org_id, qiio.create_user_id, qiio.create_time, qiio.modified_user_id, qiio.modified_time, qiio.is_delete, qiio.option1, qiio.option2, qiio.option3
mapper.select:
select , biw.inspection_way_desc,bis.inspection_standard_name,mpwo.work_order_code,bm.material_code, bm.material_desc,bm.material_version, bpm.product_model_name,s.user_name as modified_user_name,bo.organization_name, (select group_concat(substr(barcode,length(barcode)-3) separator ' ') from qms_ipqc_inspection_order_det_sample where qiiods.ipqc_inspection_order_det_id = qiiod.ipqc_inspection_order_det_id) as barcodes from qms_ipqc_inspection_order qiio left join base_inspection_way biw on qiio.inspection_way_id=biw.inspection_way_id left join base_inspection_standard bis on qiio.inspection_standard_id=bis.inspection_standard_id left join mes_pm_work_order mpwo on qiio.work_order_id=mpwo.work_order_id left join base_material bm on qiio.material_id=bm.material_id left join base_material_tab bmt on qiio.material_id=bmt.material_id left join base_product_model bpm on bmt.product_model_id=bpm.product_model_id left join qms_ipqc_inspection_order_det qiiod on qiio.ipqc_inspection_order_id=qiiod.ipqc_inspection_order_id left join qms_ipqc_inspection_order_det_sample qiiods on qiiod.ipqc_inspection_order_det_id=qiiods.ipqc_inspection_order_det_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user su on qiio.audit_user_id=su.user_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user u on qiio.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user s on qiio.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join base_organization bo ON qiio.org_id = bo.organization_id
and qiio.ipqc_inspection_order_code like CONCAT('%', #{ipqcInspectionOrderCode}, '%')
and mpwo.work_order_code like CONCAT('%', #{workOrderCode}, '%')
and qiiods.barcode like CONCAT('%', #{barcode}, '%')
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and biw.inspection_way_code =#{inspectionWayCode}
and qiio.org_id=#{orgId}
GROUP BY qiio.ipqc_inspection_order_id order by qiio.create_time desc
